meanings.definition: Of the poorest quality or the least value.
meanings.sent1: The chintziest toy in the store broke as soon as I touched it.
meanings.sent2: She bought the chintziest dress at the thrift shop.
meanings.sent3: The chintziest umbrella I owned flipped inside out in a light breeze.
meanings.sent4: The chintziest excuses couldn't cover up his mistake.
meanings.sent5: The chintziest paper tore easily when I tried to write on it.

meanings.sent1: His chintziest outfit consisted of mismatched socks and sandals.
meanings.sent2: The chintziest decorations at the party were old, faded balloons.
meanings.sent3: She tried to make the chintziest hat look fashionable by adding a feather.
meanings.sent4: The chintziest painting in the gallery clashed with the elegant ones around it.
meanings.sent5: The chintziest jewelry she wore turned her skin green.

meanings.sent1: He was known for being the chintziest person when it came to tipping.
meanings.sent2: The chintziest boss refused to provide coffee for the employees.
meanings.sent3: She received the chintziest gift—a single pencil for her birthday.
meanings.sent4: The chintziest customer argued over a few cents at the checkout.
meanings.sent5: The chintziest hotel charged extra for using the elevator.
